org.fit.cssbox.layout
Class ContentLine

java.lang.Object
  org.fit.cssbox.layout.ContentLine

public class ContentLine
extends java.lang.Object

This class describes a single line of the content in a block box. It contains the start and end index of the subboxes that form the line, the total text width and the additional width limit that can be caused by floating boxes.

Author:
burgetr
